metadata.name: Jud6s
metadata.description:
[h1][b]The Jud6s Mod v4.0.10 A racing mod for The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+[/b][/h1]
This is the Afterbirth+ version of the Jud6s mod - a mod that stays very close to the original game while slightly tweaking it to be more fair for racing. It also fixes a ton of unavoidable damage and bugs that the developers have not bothered to fix in the vanilla game.
The Afterbirth+ version of this mod should be considered [b]alpha[/b]. Many of the room fixes from Afterbirth are not re-implemented yet.
Please read [url=https://github.com/Zamiell/jud6s/blob/master/docs/version_history.md]the version changes on GitHub[/url]. (Ignore the version number inside the "metadata.xml" file; it will not match the version signified in this description / on GitHub.)
[h1]Installation notes:[/h1] [list] [*] Click the "Subscribe" button above. (Once you do that, it should automatically start downloading the mod in the background if Steam is open.) [*] Start up the game. You should see "Jud6s" on the bottom-right hand corner of the title screen. You're done! [*] Using multiple mods at the same time is bugged in various ways. If you are using Jud6s, make sure all other mods are disabled in the in-game "Mods" menu. [*] Note that you need to completely [b]restart the game[/b] after enabling or disabling Jud6s via the in-game "Mods" menu. [/list]
